name: Unnamed Tower Defence Game [Alpha]
description:
Defend yourself from waves of enemies with your arsenal of towers. Every time you hit the play button, a new map is generated so you'll never get the same map twice.


Controls
Mouse: Moving to the sides of the screen will pan the camera in that direction. Scrolling up and down on the mouse wheel will zoom in and out.


Development
This game is in very early access and in active development and is no where near its finished stage. There will be lots of changes so if you have anything you would like to see in this game, just drop a comment down below.


Confirmed Plans
These are the confirmed features to be added to the game from earliest to the latest.

  • Multiplayer (similar style to Bloons TD Battles)
  • State Persistency (Accounts, Levels)
  • Status Effects (Slow, Burn, Poison)
  • Attack Modifiers (Piercing, Ricochet, Splash, Multi-Shot)
  • More Towers/Enemies
